whatsOns.post_content: The festive season is finally here! Are you ready to feast!? Celebrate Christmas with your nearest and dearest at Criniti's. We're here for you this party season with bookings available throughout November and December for all your special moments. Christmas Day Join us on the 25th of December and party like an Italian with our $95 banquet share-style menu with complimentary sparkling for everyone on the table. We’ve put together a special Banquet-style sharing menu, combining your Criniti’s favourites and dishes inspired by a modern Australian Christmas spread. $95 per head Kids under 3 eat for free and under 12 for half price. Have special dietary requirements? Let our team know. Open Christmas Day 25th December at all Criniti's location. (Except Wetherill Park & Carousel) VIEW MENU
whatsOns.content:
The festive season is finally here! Are you ready to feast!? Celebrate Christmas with your nearest and dearest at Criniti’s.

We’re here for you this party season with bookings available throughout November and December for all your special moments.

Christmas Day

Join us on the 25th of December and party like an Italian with our $95 banquet share-style menu with complimentary sparkling for everyone on the table.

We’ve put together a special Banquet-style sharing menu, combining your Criniti’s favourites and dishes inspired by a modern Australian Christmas spread.

$95 per head

Open Christmas Day 25th December at all Criniti’s location. (Except Wetherill Park & Carousel)

acf.sub_title: Eat, drink and celebrate with us this Christmas!
acf.terms_and_condition:
1. Open to all bookings (8+ guests)
2. $250 deposit – $95 per person set menu
3. Available for any day in November or December 2024
4. COMPLIMENTARY GLASS OF SPARKLING FOR THE WHOLE TABLE ON CHRISTMAS DAY(not sure what will be served- as per availability).
5. The Christmas Set Menu is available throughout November and December. Please note that on 25th December (Christmas Day), the Wetherill Park and Carousel locations will be closed.

whatsOns.post_content: And just like that, 2024 is coming to an end! 🎉 After a whirlwind year, it’s time for an unforgettable celebration. Join us at Criniti's on Tuesday, 31st December for a night filled with delicious food, drinks, and fun as we welcome 2025 in style! Seating is limited, so don’t miss out! Secure your spot now and get ready to make this New Year’s Eve one to remember! 🥂✨ New Year’s Eve reservations are now open! 🎇 Tap the link to reserve your table and view our special menu. BOOK NOW!

acf.terms_and_condition:

  • All guests are to be seated in the venue at 7pm to ensure smooth service. We do not take responsibility for delays if arrival is later than this time
  • Standard RSA regulation applies and Criniti’s reserves the right to refuse service of alcohol

whatsOns.post_content: Join us every Thursday in September and October from 5:00 PM to 6:30 PM for an interactive and fun pizza-making experience at Criniti's! 🍕 Whether you're a novice or a foodie, our expert chefs will guide you through the process of crafting the perfect pizza, from dough to toppings. At just $45 per adult, you'll not only learn the secrets to making delicious pizza but also get to enjoy your culinary creation. Don't miss out—reserve your spot today and become a pizza pro!
whatsOns.content:
Join us every Thursday in September and October from 5:00 PM to 6:30 PM for an interactive and fun pizza-making experience at Criniti’s! 🍕 Whether you’re a novice or a foodie, our expert chefs will guide you through the process of crafting the perfect pizza, from dough to toppings. At just $45 per adult, you’ll not only learn the secrets to making delicious pizza but also get to enjoy your culinary creation.

Don’t miss out—reserve your spot today and become a pizza pro!

acf.terms_and_condition:

whatsOns.post_content:
WE'RE HIRING.

LOVE FOOD. LOVE WORK. LOVE PEOPLE.

We’re passionate about great food, great people and living life to the fullest! We're looking for experienced and energetic staff to join our family to start immediately.

Benefits include:
1. An opportunity to join a fast growing hospitality company
2. Access to staff discounts across all Criniti's Restaurants in the country
3. Exposure to multiple training programmes and staff incentives

Eligibility Criteria:

1. Minimum 3 months of hospitality experience (If applying for managerial positions)
2. Restaurant operation knowledge
3. Team Player

The right candidate must be:
1. Punctual and well presented
2. Experience using POS is a plus
3. Have availability to work on a rotating roster including weekends and public holidays
4. Eager to learn and always happy to smile

*Please note that an RSA is required*
Join our crazy, passionate famiglia - we can't wait to grow with you! Email your CV to the appropriate store or pop in and hand in your CV !

Job openings-

Assistant manager
Supervisor
Waitstaff
Order taker
Runner
Bar staff
Kitchen staff

Email us your CV at-

Darling Harbour (NSW)- darlingharbour@crinitis.com.au
Castle Hill (NSW)- castlehill@crinitis.com.au
Wetherill Park (NSW)- wetherillpark@crinitis.com.au
Kotara (NSW)- kotara@crinitis.com.au
Carlton (VIC)- carlton@crinitis.com.au
Southbank (VIC)- southbank@crinitis.com.au

whatsOns.post_content: Chef’s Special: Pistachio Panna Cotta- $26 Savor the elegance of our Pistachio Panna Cotta, a luxurious dessert that brings together the finest Italian flavors. Silky-smooth cream infused with roasted pistachios and white chocolate creates a rich, indulgent base, while the pistachio ganache adds a decadent finish. Perfectly balanced and beautifully presented, this vegetarian dessert offers a truly unforgettable sweet experience. Treat yourself to this delicious masterpiece and let your taste buds rejoice! When you’re here, you’re family! JOIN LA FAMIGLIA

whatsOns.content:
Celebrate with us during your birthday month and we’ll treat you to 7% OFF on your total bill, a FREE cannoli tower from our in-house La Patisserie as well as balloons.

Not enough? We have special set menus and beverage packages for a party of 10+ served in banquet style and consists of Criniti’s favorites.

Join La Famiglia and let us spoil you on your special day – you deserve it!

acf.sub_title: Today is a great day cause it's your birthday!
acf.terms_and_condition:
1. A deposit of $250.00 must be made online through our website to avail this offer.

2. Incentives are valid for one standard cannoli tower per booking and 7% discount for VIP members only.

3. Reservations are essential.

4. A minimum spend of $300 must be met to receive your complimentary cannoli tower.

5. Reservations must be made & confirmed 48 hours prior the booking date.

6. Not valid with any other offer, discount, or promotion.

7. Any extras are charged at an additional cost.

8. A minimum of 8 guests is required to be eligible for the package.

9. Provisions for decoration items are always subject to availability.

10. Criniti’s reserves the right to make changes to the VIP b’day Bonus at any time without notice.

11. Incentives must be claimed within your birthday month (allowing for a few days grace either side of the date).

12. Incentives is only valid for the VIP customer plus two-family members on the account under the age of 12.

13. The Incentives can only be redeemed once a year.
acf.prompt_text: CLICK ON THE IMAGE TO KNOW MORE

whatsOns.post_content:
Welcome to Criniti's Restaurant, the perfect venue for your upcoming event! We offer a range of packages to suit all types of events, whether you're planning a birthday celebration, corporate function, or intimate gathering. Our expert team is dedicated to making your event a success. Here are just a few of the events that we can cater to at Criniti's Restaurant:
  1. Birthday Celebrations: Whether it's a milestone birthday or a more intimate gathering, we'll create a memorable experience. Our menu features a wide range of Italian dishes, and we can accommodate dietary restrictions upon request.
  2. Corporate Functions: Our restaurant has the perfect setting for your next corporate event. We can host business meetings, and our dedicated team will ensure that all of your needs are met.
  3. Engagement Parties: Celebrate your engagement with family and friends in style at Criniti's Restaurant. We offer a range of packages to suit all budgets, and our team will ensure to create an unforgettable experience.
  4. Family Gatherings: Whether it's a family reunion or a special occasion, our restaurant is the perfect venue to bring your loved ones together. Our extensive menu and a range of seating options suit any group size.
  5. Anniversary Celebrations: Celebrate your love story Italian flair! Choose from our set menus or work with our team to create a customized dining experience for you and your partner.
  6. Baby Showers: Spoil the mum-to-be with a delightful baby shower. Our welcoming environment of our stores and delicious food to go along with it will set the perfect tone for this joyous occasion.
  7. Baptism/Christening: Commemorate your child's special day with a heartfelt gathering. Our elegant ambiance and flexible room options are ideal for hosting an intimate christening or a larger celebratory meal.
At Criniti's Restaurant, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and delicious food. Contact us today to learn more about our event packages and how we can help make your next event a success. VIEW MENU
whatsOns.content:
Welcome to Criniti’s Restaurant, the perfect venue for your upcoming event! We offer a range of packages to suit all types of events, whether you’re planning a birthday celebration, corporate function, or intimate gathering.

Our expert team is dedicated to making your event a success.

Here are just a few of the events that we can cater to at Criniti’s Restaurant:

  1. Birthday Celebrations: Whether it’s a milestone birthday or a more intimate gathering, we’ll create a memorable experience. Our menu features a wide range of Italian dishes, and we can accommodate dietary restrictions upon request.
  2. Corporate Functions: Our restaurant has the perfect setting for your next corporate event. We can host business meetings, and our dedicated team will ensure that all of your needs are met.
  3. Engagement Parties: Celebrate your engagement with family and friends in style at Criniti’s Restaurant. We offer a range of packages to suit all budgets, and our team will ensure to create an unforgettable experience.
  4. Family Gatherings: Whether it’s a family reunion or a special occasion, our restaurant is the perfect venue to bring your loved ones together.
    Our extensive menu and a range of seating options suit any group size.
  5. Anniversary Celebrations: Celebrate your love story Italian flair! Choose from our set menus or work with our team to create a customized dining experience for you and your partner.
  6. Baby Showers: Spoil the mum-to-be with a delightful baby shower. Our welcoming environment of our stores and delicious food to go along with it will set the perfect tone for this joyous occasion.
  7. Baptism/Christening: Commemorate your child’s special day with a heartfelt gathering. Our elegant ambiance and flexible room options are ideal for hosting an intimate christening or a larger celebratory meal.

At Criniti’s Restaurant, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and delicious food. Contact us today to learn more about our event packages and how we can help make your next event a success.

VIEW MENU

whatsOns.post_content: KIDS AND CORPORATE PIZZA CLASSES Learn the art of pizza making in our immersive and hands-on classes! Our pizza-making classes are designed to teach you the techniques and secrets behind creating delicious and authentic pizzas from scratch. In these interactive sessions, our experienced instructors will guide you through each step of the pizza-making process, from preparing the perfect dough to selecting and combining high-quality ingredients. You'll learn how to knead the dough to achieve the ideal texture and elasticity and properly shape and stretch it to create a thin and crispy crust. We'll also introduce you to various toppings and cheeses, allowing you to experiment and create unique combinations. Whether you're a beginner or a pizza enthusiast looking to refine your skills, our classes are suitable for all levels. Come join us for a fun-filled experience where you'll learn the art of pizza making, create lasting memories, and enjoy the delicious fruits of your labor. For Booking, Email us at reservations@crinitis.com.au or call us at 02 8026 7700 When you’re here, you’re family!
whatsOns.content:
KIDS AND CORPORATE PIZZA CLASSES

Learn the art of pizza making in our immersive and hands-on classes! Our pizza-making classes are designed to teach you the techniques and secrets behind creating delicious and authentic pizzas from scratch.

In these interactive sessions, our experienced instructors will guide you through each step of the pizza-making process, from preparing the perfect dough to selecting and combining high-quality ingredients. You’ll learn how to knead the dough to achieve the ideal texture and elasticity and properly shape and stretch it to create a thin and crispy crust.

We’ll also introduce you to various toppings and cheeses, allowing you to experiment and create unique combinations.

Whether you’re a beginner or a pizza enthusiast looking to refine your skills, our classes are suitable for all levels. Come join us for a fun-filled experience where you’ll learn the art of pizza making, create lasting memories, and enjoy the delicious fruits of your labor.

For Booking, Email us at reservations@crinitis.com.au or call us at 02 8026 7700

When you’re here, you’re family!

whatsOns.post_content: Looking for a delizioso and hearty breakfast to kick off your day? Look no further than Criniti's and our breakfast menu! With a variety to choose from, including classic options like bacon and eggs, and unique offerings like our fig and ricotta bruschetta, there's something for everyone. If you're in the mood for something classic, try our Bruschetta & Eggs, which comes with your choice of pane, hashbrowns, and two eggs cooked to your liking. Or, if you're feeling more adventurous, try our Smoked Salmon Bruschetta or our Rustico Bruschetta with bacon, sautéed forest mushrooms, and poached eggs. For those with a sweet tooth, our Nutella Pancakes are a must-try. Topped with caramelized bananas, strawberries, and Oreo crumbs, this dish is sure to satisfy your cravings. And if you're looking for something a bit more indulgent, try our Loaded Thick Shakes, like the Banana Caramel or Oreo Smash. And for our health-conscious community, we offer a Healthy Breaky with beetroot feta, mushrooms, sautéed kale, tomato, cucumber, halloumi, quinoa, avocado, asparagus, and a poached egg. Or, try our Homemade Granola with berry yogurt and fresh fruits. Don't forget to follow us on social media and sign up for our VIP membership to receive special offers and discounts. Visit us at Criniti's and start your day off right with our delizioso breakfast menu. Available at our Brighton Le Sands, Karrinyup & Southbank locations only.
whatsOns.post_title: BREAKFAST MENU - BRIGHTON LE SANDS, KARRINYUP & SOUTHBANK
whatsOns.content:
Looking for a delizioso and hearty breakfast to kick off your day? Look no further than Criniti’s and our breakfast menu!

With a variety to choose from, including classic options like bacon and eggs, and unique offerings like our fig and ricotta bruschetta, there’s something for everyone.

If you’re in the mood for something classic, try our Bruschetta & Eggs, which comes with your choice of pane, hashbrowns, and two eggs cooked to your liking. Or, if you’re feeling more adventurous, try our Smoked Salmon Bruschetta or our Rustico Bruschetta with bacon, sautéed forest mushrooms, and poached eggs.

For those with a sweet tooth, our Nutella Pancakes are a must-try. Topped with caramelized bananas, strawberries, and Oreo crumbs, this dish is sure to satisfy your cravings. And if you’re looking for something a bit more indulgent, try our Loaded Thick Shakes, like the Banana Caramel or Oreo Smash.

And for our health-conscious community, we offer a Healthy Breaky with beetroot feta, mushrooms, sautéed kale, tomato, cucumber, halloumi, quinoa, avocado, asparagus, and a poached egg. Or, try our Homemade Granola with berry yogurt and fresh fruits.

Don’t forget to follow us on social media and sign up for our VIP membership to receive special offers and discounts. Visit us at Criniti’s and start your day off right with our delizioso breakfast menu.

Available at our Brighton Le Sands, Karrinyup & Southbank locations only.

acf.sub_title: Brighton Le Sands | Fri, Sat & Sun | From 8:30am to 11:30am    Karrinyup | Sat & Sun | From 8:30am to 11:30am   Southbank | All Days | From 8:30am to 11:30am
acf.terms_and_condition:
1. Valid with a VIP discount

2. Everyday at Southbank.

3. Sat & Sun at Karrinyup

4. Fri, Sat & Sun at Brighton Le Sands

Join La Famiglia

acf.sub_title: Banquet style dining for larger groups.
acf.terms_and_condition:
• Menu Priced Per Head.
  • Bookings should be confirmed 48 hours prior to the date.
  • Any dietary requirements please let the reservations team know 48 hours
    prior to the booking and we will do out best to accommodate them.
  • A set menu is compulsory for 15+ guests.
  • A set menu is compulsory for 10+ guests at our Southbank and Parramatta locations, on Saturdays & Sundays.
  • A beverage pack is compulsory for 20+ guests.
  • Kids under 3 eat for free and under 12 for half price.
  • A 10% surcharge applies on Sundays and Public Holidays.
  • We take the table preference, however, do not guarantee the exact spot.
  • We are halal certified.
  • Your seat will be held 15 minutes post your reservation time.
  • Time duration applies to all bookings as well as set-menu.
  • The deposit is non-refundable, and one time use only.
  • The remaining amount on the deposit is non-refundable.
  • A 48-hour notice is required to increase or decrease the number of
    guests.
  • Please note that the number of guests confirmed by this time is the
    number of guests that will charged for the set menu at the time of
    dining.

  • Any dietary requirements please let the reservations team know 48 hours prior to the booking and we will do our best to
    accommodate them.
  • A set menu is compulsory for 10+ guests.
  • A beverage pack is compulsory for 20+ guests.
  • Kids under 3 eat for free and under 12 for half price.
  • A 10% surcharge applies on Sundays.
  • A 15% surcharge applies on Public Holidays.
  • A 1.5% surcharge applies to all card transactions.
  • We take the table preference, however, do no guarantee the exact spot.
  • We are halal certified.
  • Your seat will be held 15 minutes post your reservation time.
  • Time duration applies to all bookings as well as set-menu.
  • The depost is non-refundable, and one time use only.
  • The remaining amount on the deposit is non-refundable.
  • A 48-hour notice is required to increase or decrease the number of guests.
  • Please note that the number of guests confirmed by this time is the number of guests that will be charged for the set menu at the
    time of dining.
  • A ‘Cakeage’ fee of $2.50 per person will be applied to any outside cakes

Cancellation Policy

  • Notifications required via email reservations@crinitis.com.au
  • Your deposit will be deducted from your final bill at the time of dining.
  • Refund takes 3-5 business days.
  • 3% of the total deposit will be deducted while processing the refund, if the cancellation is prior to at least one week of the booking date and 10% will be deducted if the cancellation is done within one week from the booking date.
  • The booking date can be transferred if customer is not able to attend and refund cannot be made in such event.
acf.prompt_text: CLICK ON THE IMAGE TO KNOW MORE

We have opened up 3 new stores recently and are looking for experienced and energetic staff to join our family (both front & back of house). Access to staff discounts across all Criniti's Restaurants in the country 3. Exposure to multiple training programmes and staff incentives The right candidate must be: 1. Eager to learn and always happy to smile *Please note that an RSA is required* Join our crazy, passionate Famiglia - we can't wait to grow with you!
whatsOns.content:
Ciao Famiglia!

WE ARE HIRING.
LOVE FOOD. LOVE WORK. LOVE PEOPLE.

We’re passionate about great food, great people and living life to the fullest!

We have opened up 3 new stores recently and are looking for experienced and energetic staff to join our family (both front & back of house).

HOW TO APPLY: email Kathy Criniti at kathy@crinitis.com.au with your resume
CONTACT: Kathy Criniti 0280267700

Benefits include:
1. An opportunity to join a fast growing hospitality company
2. Access to staff discounts across all Criniti’s Restaurants in the country
3. Exposure to multiple training programmes and staff incentives

The right candidate must be:
1. Punctual and well presented
2. Experience using POS is a plus
3. Have your current NSW RSA
4. Have availability to work on a rotating roster including weekends and public holidays
5. Eager to learn and always happy to smile

*Please note that an RSA is required*
Join our crazy, passionate Famiglia – we can’t wait to grow with you!

acf.sub_title: There is never a dull moment at Criniti's! Check out all of our latest promotions & events
acf.header_title: Criniti's Italian Restaurant | Sydney, Melbourne, Newcastle Perth and Brisbane
acf.header_description: Authentic Italian pizza and pasta in Sydney, Melbourne & Newcastle. With a range of dishes from steaks & burgers, to seafood & salads.
acf.header_keywords: pizza, pasta, Italian, Italian cuisine, take away, restaurant, breakfast, lunch, dinner, dessert, coffee, drinks, cocktails, steak, seafood, gluten free, spaghetti, best Italian, birthday dinner, Sydney, Parramatta, darling harbour, darling harbour, castle hill, Newcastle, Melbourn, Perth, Brisbane, functions
